name: Fun Racing Games Collection
summary:
Push your driving abilities to the limit at the wheel of winged sprint cars, or feel the speed as you race in some of the fastest karts and most challenging courses from around the world!;Powerslide in light-weight, high-powered cars across dirt, ice and snow tracks, and take part in a variety of championships and challenges and unlock extra karts and cars. 
 
3 adrenaline pumping racers in one collection 
3 kart classes including 60cc, 125cc, and super 250cc super, and wicked sprint cars 
Turbo boost, for that extra edge 
Split-screen head-to-head racing 
Practice or challenge mode 
Loads of unlockable bonus features 
Single player modes include race, knockout, challenge and stunt arena
